heading: HB06166
0: AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF TWO BILLION AND FORTY MILLION PESOS (P2,040,000,000.00) AS SUPPLEMENTAL APPROPRIATIONS FOR THE FY 2020 AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2020-02-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06166
FULL TITLE : AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF TWO BILLION AND FORTY MILLION PESOS (P2,040,000,000.00) AS SUPPLEMENTAL APPROPRIATIONS FOR THE FY 2020 AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Intends to strengthen D O H's duty to protect and promote the right to health of the people and instill health consciousness among them through the repatriation of affected Filipinos and procurement of adequate and appropriate surgical masks for persons under investigation and health workers as well as the needed personal protective equipment. Proposes to supplement the General Appropriations Act of 2020 ( Republic Act No.11465) to augment the budget for the health system response of the D O H on the 2019 - novel coronavirus acute respiratory disease ( 2019 - N C O V A R D ).
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, ANGELINA "HELEN" D.L. M.D.
DATE FILED : 2020-02-04
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS ON 2020-02-05
